---
**Environment** - Xperience by Kentico version: [28.4.0] - .NET version: [8] - Deployment environment: [Local | Azure] - Link to [Example of hero widget](https://docs.kentico.com/tutorial/quickstart-guides/digital-marketing/reuse-content-with-the-hero-widget)
